My Expertise

Data scientist and machine learning enthusiast with a curiousity for applications in fraud, healthcare, real estate and more. Check out the tools I commonly use and projects I've developed for my blog below. Born and raised in New York, I am a computer nerd, chef, and golfer at heart.
